channel.title: How will you play Black Mesa?
channel.description:
Will you explore every minute detail and mindlessly chuck plastic cups at scientists' heads while holding down the F5 key the entire time, or will you play through it more casually to get a general feel for the mod while still being perceptive of your surroundings?
I'm planning on doing both, but I just can't decide in which order.

item.title: How will you play Black Mesa?
item.dc:creator: tonkat
item.description:
i would change the main page to a count down clock with a direct pun related to half life. then release the download threw multiple source to discourage congestion of servers.
[COLOR=‘DimGray’]
…something like that

Read full topic

item.title: How will you play Black Mesa?
item.dc:creator: SarahDank
item.description:
Bloodshot:

With a really stupid fucking grin on my face the entire time.

This. I actually think im going to :’( at the start. and then be all like :fffuuu:

item.source: How will you play Black Mesa?

item.title: How will you play Black Mesa?
item.dc:creator: Joe_Freeman
item.description:
I like to get into the character. At first I walk by the corridors calmly, but when the disaster has begun then I go crazy. I like to take cover and shoot the enemies like if I was Al Pacino in the final scene of Scarface, screaming all over(Sometimes I actually scream, I’m weird) If one of my mates die I talk sadly to his corpse for a moment, then I stand up and make those pigs regret killing him. And when things get very fucked up I run away like a chicken. That’s why I love FPS.

Read full topic
item.source: How will you play Black Mesa?

item.source: How will you play Black Mesa?

item.title: How will you play Black Mesa?
item.dc:creator: Insomniak
item.description:
I’m going to play it under hypnosis, then at the end I’ll forget I’ve ever played it. Repeat process. Perhaps I’ll uncover a few childhood memories that never happened along the way. End up dreaming about the Gman for the rest of my life. Wake up babbling incoherently about something in the water, to make us forget.

Then I’ll play it again in a padded room under lock and key.

Read full topic
item.source: How will you play Black Mesa?

item.title: How will you play Black Mesa?
item.dc:creator: mrrampant
item.description:
Will take my time. I’ve always wantedto play a modern version of HL since playing HL2. Like any game, if there are bugs or glitches but it’s otherwise playable, instead of complaining, I will try to use to my advantage.

Read full topic
item.source: How will you play Black Mesa?

item.title: How will you play Black Mesa?
item.dc:creator: BahamutBBob
item.description:
Now that we know when it’s coming out, I know what I’ll do.

Download it at work, since my internet speed at home sucks balls, bring it home, install, and play it until I go through the Lambda portal.

Subsequent playthroughs I’ll observe more detail.

Read full topic
item.source: How will you play Black Mesa?

item.title: How will you play Black Mesa?
item.dc:creator: afterwars
item.description:
I’ll probably play it really slow to guffaw at all the detail first time through, then I’ll play it again!

Read full topic
item.source: How will you play Black Mesa?

item.title: How will you play Black Mesa?
item.dc:creator: TheDragonMask
item.description:
Probably piece by piece, not all at once. And then when it ends, either I’ll play the Xen parts with my heavily modded Half Life 1 files, or just skip it and move on to play until the annoying cliffhanger of HL2:EP2. Then I’ll replay Black mesa a few times. Then I’ll go back to waiting, trying to keep my mind off Xen.

Read full topic

item.title: How will you play Black Mesa?
item.dc:creator: Juan_Regular
item.description:
I´ll sit my ass down on my couch, get my Ikea Dave table ready, put a few cold ones next to me and play non-stop until I finish it.
Then I´m going off to work and play it all again on my shitty laptop, wishing I could´ve taken my desktop PC with me.

item.title: How will you play Black Mesa?
item.dc:creator: Disturbulator
item.description:
I get seriously wasted.

Then Play as Much as I can before passing out.

Wake up the Next Morning.

Remember nothing.
Play it again.
And it will all still be new.
